page.title: 06LEISURE FACILITIES
page.content: THE LOWEST ORDER LEISURE FACILITY INTHE SURVEY AREA IS A YOUTH CLUB. THIS IS BASED AT THE GREENSWARD SCHOOL AND ATTRACTS A LARGE NUMBER OF TEENAGERS FROM THE AREA. THE OTHER YOUTH CLUB THAT EXISTED WITHIN THE TOWN CLOSED DOWN, THEREFORE, INCREASING THE CATCHMENT AREA OF THE GREENSWARD YOUTH CLUB. APART FROM SPORTS FACILITIES IN THE AREA AND PUBLIC HOUSES LEISURE FACILITIES ARE LIMITED. AS A RESULT OF THIS A LARGE NUMBER OF PEOPLE TURN TO SOUTHEND AND OTHER MAJOR URBAN AREAS FOR THEIR LEISURE PURSUITS.
